attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: this app is scary 😛 first i see some orange ompa lompa on my screen and i jump in fear 😭😱 i will not be able to sleep at night all because of this app. no one get this app unless u want NIGHTMARES!!!!

attributes.title: Literally the worst
attributes.review: I don’t understand why this app even still exists. It’s terribly formatted and used for the worst possible things.

attributes.title: Poor quality
attributes.review: The app is glitchy and froze on my phone several times. Was hoping for a “great” app. What a shame.

attributes.title: Truthful review
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and almost immediately without hesitation deleted it. Rating? -1/10 definitely do NOT recommend

attributes.title: tuck frump
attributes.review: i didn’t even need to open the app to see how much hypocrisy would be in it, providing false information on the Democratic Party based on his own biases? SAD! FAKE NEWS.

attributes.title: disappointed
attributes.review: I’m so disappointed with this app i came here to get information but all i saw were lies and and a giant cheeto it scared me soo bad that i now have to have therapy. DO NOT GET!!!

attributes.title: Don’t see a point
attributes.review: Good app but I don’t really see the point

attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP
attributes.review: After a month of having this app I slowly started turning ORANGE. Yeah, you heard me right orange. This app brainwashes and manipulates you into turning orange. Do not get it unless you want to end up looking like Donald Trump.

attributes.title: Not what I thought
attributes.review: ✨I downloaded the app 💓to stay up to date with the 🥰wonderful ✨president✨ but ✨sadly all the information was about a ,fascist 💓,racist ,🌟homophobic😘 ,xenophobic ✨Cheeto puff✨. Sadly 🥺I had to delete😭👉🏻👈🏻

attributes.title: no❤️
attributes.review: i would give it no stars if I could. immediately when i opened the app, this orange guy looked like he was going to hurt me😗🧚🏼‍♀️.  not anything approachable. no❤️
